00020 #if defined(__ICCAVR__)
00021 
00022 /* IAR Embedded Workbench */
00023 #  include <inavr.h>
00024 
00025 #  define _GET_LOCK_BITS() __AddrToZByteToSPMCR_LPM( (void __flash *) 0x0001, 0x09 )
00026 #  define _GET_LOW_FUSES() __AddrToZByteToSPMCR_LPM( (void __flash *) 0x0000, 0x09 )
00027 #  define _GET_HIGH_FUSES() __AddrToZByteToSPMCR_LPM( (void __flash *) 0x0003, 0x09 )
00028 #  define _GET_EXTENDED_FUSES() __AddrToZByteToSPMCR_LPM( (void __flash *) 0x0002, 0x09 )
00029 #  define _SET_LOCK_BITS(data) __DataToR0ByteToSPMCR_SPM( data, 0x09 )
00030 #  define _ENABLE_RWW_SECTION() __DataToR0ByteToSPMCR_SPM( 0x00, 0x11 )
00031 
00032 #  define _WAIT_FOR_SPM() while( SPMCR_REG & (1<<SPMEN) );
00033 
00034 #  ifndef LARGE_MEMORY
00035 #    define _LOAD_PROGRAM_MEMORY(addr) __load_program_memory( (const unsigned char __flash *) (addr) )
00036 #    define _FILL_TEMP_WORD(addr,data) __AddrToZWordToR1R0ByteToSPMCR_SPM( (void __flash *) (addr), data, 0x01 )
00037 #    define _PAGE_ERASE(addr) __AddrToZByteToSPMCR_SPM( (void __flash *) (addr), 0x03 )
00038 #    define _PAGE_WRITE(addr) __AddrToZByteToSPMCR_SPM( (void __flash *) (addr), 0x05 )
00039 #  else /* LARGE_MEMORY */
00040 #    define _LOAD_PROGRAM_MEMORY(addr) __extended_load_program_memory( (const unsigned char __farflash *) (addr) )
00041 #    define _FILL_TEMP_WORD(addr,data) __AddrToZ24WordToR1R0ByteToSPMCR_SPM( (void __farflash *) (addr), data, 0x01 )
00042 #    define _PAGE_ERASE(addr) __AddrToZ24ByteToSPMCR_SPM( (void __farflash *) (addr), 0x03 )
00043 #    define _PAGE_WRITE(addr) __AddrToZ24ByteToSPMCR_SPM( (void __farflash *) (addr), 0x05 )
00044 #  endif /* LARGE_MEMORY */
00045 
00046 #elif __GNUC__ > 0
00047 
00048 /* AVR-GCC/avr-libc */
00049 #  include <avr/boot.h>
00050 #  include <avr/pgmspace.h>
00051 
00052 #  if defined(GET_LOCK_BITS)    /* avr-libc >= 1.2.5 */
00053 #    define _GET_LOCK_BITS() boot_lock_fuse_bits_get(GET_LOCK_BITS)
00054 #    define _GET_LOW_FUSES() boot_lock_fuse_bits_get(GET_LOW_FUSE_BITS)
00055 #    define _GET_HIGH_FUSES() boot_lock_fuse_bits_get(GET_HIGH_FUSE_BITS)
00056 #    define _GET_EXTENDED_FUSES() boot_lock_fuse_bits_get(GET_EXTENDED_FUSE_BITS)
00057 #  endif /* defined(GET_LOCK_BITS) */
00058 #  define _SET_LOCK_BITS(data) boot_lock_bits_set(~data)
00059 #  define _ENABLE_RWW_SECTION() boot_rww_enable()
00060 
00061 #  define _WAIT_FOR_SPM() boot_spm_busy_wait()
00062 
00063 #  ifndef LARGE_MEMORY
00064 #    define _LOAD_PROGRAM_MEMORY(addr) pgm_read_byte_near(addr)
00065 #  else /* LARGE_MEMORY */
00066 #    define _LOAD_PROGRAM_MEMORY(addr) pgm_read_byte_far(addr)
00067 #  endif /* LARGE_MEMORY */
00068 #  define _FILL_TEMP_WORD(addr,data) boot_page_fill(addr, data)
00069 #  define _PAGE_ERASE(addr) boot_page_erase(addr)
00070 #  define _PAGE_WRITE(addr) boot_page_write(addr)
00071
